question.title: is @Transactional(isolation = Isolation.REPEATABLE_READ) enough for safe incrementing?
question.body:
Is it possible to lost increment here? If not, is it possible in case of read_commited level?

@Transactional
public updateProductStatistics(Long productId) {
        ProductStats stats = productStatsRepository.findByProductId(productId);
        stats.setTotalSold(stats.getTotalSold() + 1); // lost increment?
        productStatsRepository.save(stats);
    }
